name: Adventure in the Swiss Alps
description: Explore the beauty of the Swiss Alps with guided tours and outdoor activities.

itinerary.activity: Arrival in Zurich, transfer to the Alps

name: Beach Paradise in Bali
description: Relax on the stunning beaches of Bali with luxurious resorts and activities.

name: Cultural Tour of Japan
description: Experience the rich culture and history of Japan with guided tours of Tokyo, Kyoto, and Osaka.

name: Safari Adventure in Kenya
description: Discover the wildlife of Kenya on a safari adventure through national parks.

description: Enjoy a romantic vacation in the city of love with guided tours of iconic Paris landmarks.

name: Amazon Rainforest Expedition
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure through the heart of the Amazon rainforest.

itinerary.activity: Arrival in Manaus, transfer to the Amazon

name: Northern Lights in Iceland
description: Witness the magical Northern Lights in Iceland with guided tours of the stunning landscape.

itinerary.activity: Visit to Blue Lagoon and Golden Circle

name: Historical Tour of Rome
description: Explore the rich history of Rome with guided tours of ancient ruins and monuments.

Free day for shopping and personal exploration

description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and culture of Egypt with guided tours of ancient ruins.
